issues.description: In fix_vec_sub.asm, the template declares the function symbol as global, but the solution uses an extern directive instead of global. This linkage mismatch means the solutionâ€™s fix_vec_sub_asm symbol is not exported, leading to linker errors and confusion about how to declare function symbols consistently.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the extern directive in the solution to a global directive (global fix_vec_sub_asm) so that the symbol is exported consistently, matching the template.
